mapper.sql: id, service_no, phone_number, name, type_id, worker_number, "is_ satisfied", user_comment, comment_content, status, note, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select: SELECT cspr.id,cspr.phone_number,cspr.name,cspr.phone_type,cspr.status, csj.worker_number,csj.begin_time,csj.end_time, csp.id AS problem_id,csp.title,csp.type_id, cspd.description, cpp.pic_url FROM customer_service_phone_record AS cspr LEFT JOIN customer_service_journal AS csj ON cspr.id= csj.service_id LEFT JOIN customer_service_problem AS csp ON csj.service_id = csp.service_id LEFT JOIN customer_problem_type AS cpt ON csp.type_id = cpt.id LEFT JOIN customer_service_problem_description AS cspd ON csp.id = cspd.problem_id LEFT JOIN customer_problem_picture AS cpp ON csp.id = cpp.problem_id WHERE cspr.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into customer_service_phone_record (id, service_no, phone_number, name, type_id, worker_number, "is_ satisfied", user_comment, comment_content, status, note, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serviceNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workerNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSatisfied,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userComment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=BIGINT})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
insert into customer_service_phone_record
id,
service_no,
phone_number,
name,
type_id,
worker_number,
"is_ satisfied",
user_comment,
comment_content,
status,
note,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,

mapper.update:
update customer_service_phone_record
service_no = #{serviceNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
worker_number = #{workerNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
"is_ satisfied" = #{isSatisfied,jdbcType=TINYINT},
user_comment = #{userComment,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comment_content = #{commentContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=BIGINT},
phone_Type = #{phoneType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update customer_service_phone_record set service_no = #{serviceNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, worker_number = #{workerNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "is_ satisfied" = #{isSatisfied,jdbcType=TINYINT}, user_comment = #{userComment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment_content = #{commentContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
